properties.description: This sql script file will be used to extract data from nyc taxi csv file.

content.query:
-- Read data from a CSV file with header as True
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsecoursedlhp.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW=TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR ='\n'
    )
WITH
(
    LocationID INT,
    Borough VARCHAR(15),
    Zone VARCHAR(50),
    service_zone VARCHAR(15)
)
 AS [result]

--Create a database named nyc_taxi_discovery
create DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery;

--Use the data base and set collation for that DB
USE nyc_taxi_discovery

ALTER DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8;

--Query the sys.databases table to verify the collation value.
SELECT NAME,COLLATIOn_NAME FROM sys.databases

--Query to select specific 2 columns from the CSV file.
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsecoursedlhp.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR ='\n'
    )
WITH
(
    Borough VARCHAR(15),
    Zone VARCHAR(50)
)
 AS [result]

--read data from a file without column header
 SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsecoursedlhp.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR ='\n'
    )
WITH
(
    Borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
    Zone VARCHAR(50) 3
)
 AS [result]

 --read data from the file with custom header name, also uses the option of skipping rows from data using firstrow option.
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapsecoursedlhp.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRSTROW=2,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR ='\n'
    )
WITH
(
    location_id INT 1,
    borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
    zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
)
 AS [result]

 CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data
 WITH(
    LOCATION='abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlhp.dfs.core.windows.net/'
)

DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        data_source='nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRSTROW=2,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR ='\n'
    )
WITH
(
    location_id INT 1,
    borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
    zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
)
 AS [result]


CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data_raw
WITH (
    LOCATION='abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlhp.dfs.core.windows.net/raw'
)

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'taxi_zone.csv',
        data_source='nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRSTROW=2,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR ='\n'
    )
WITH
(
    location_id INT 1,
    borough VARCHAR(15) 2,
    zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
    service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
)
 AS [result]

SELECT name,location FROM sys.external_data_sources
